title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 61.3 - Preservation of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 61.3 - Preservation of records

State Regulations

Tax Law, §§ 426, 445; Administrative Code of the City of

New York, §§ 11-2057, 11-2058
(a) The
records and invoices required to be maintained, prepared and kept by
distributors, owners and others as provided in this Subchapter shall be
preserved for a period of three years. (b) See Part 2402 of this Title for taxpayer
record retention formats. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
61.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
